channel.title: Talk to FRANK
channel.description:
ollie says (11:38): is it ok to take drugs listening to http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=2I2BVnGnI1Q
Talk to FRANK says (11:38): That's interesting that you should say that, aslong as you're careful.
RIFK RIFK RIFK RIFK

item.title: Talk to FRANK
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Mopman:

Considering Frank is a UK site, and we don’t use xray scanners in airports here, I don’t think many people feed their dogs plastic containers of drugs.

I will keep this in mind when travelling to the UK

Read full topic

item.title: Talk to FRANK

item.description:

http://www.talktofrank.com/basement.aspx

Haha I love how there is a dead dog on the floor all bloody. “If you do coke, your dog WILL die.”

[/quote]

I think its to explain how desperate people are for drugs.[/quote]

That you slash your dog’s chest open, and store the heart in a jar on the shelf?

I have got to get some of that shit.

item.title: Talk to FRANK
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

http://www.talktofrank.com/basement.aspx

Haha I love how there is a dead dog on the floor all bloody. “If you do coke, your dog WILL die.”

Talk to FRANK says:
Risks of Cannabis
[blah blah blah]
Type “more” for more or type “?” to see everything I know.

Jamie says:
more

Talk to FRANK says:
Who are you, Oliver Twist?

Jamie says:
more

Talk to FRANK says:
More, more, more. Haven’t you had enough?

I hope you don’t mind me asking but… Are you male or female?

Read full topic

item.title: Talk to FRANK
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Dave says:
is it safe to use a condom underwater

Talk to FRANK says:
Welcome back, Dave.

The Talk to FRANK Bot is a fully automated Windows Live Agent designed to give young people information on drugs from content supplied by FRANK, the national drug information and advice service. Information provided to you by FRANK is not endorsed by Microsoft and does not reflect Microsoft’s views on drug use. For more information, click here —> http://l.rdir.us/ct?CwZS/0

Here are some questions you can ask me:

1 Is cannabis harmless?
2 Is cannabis legal?

To find out more, type “?”

Dave says:
is it safe to use a condom underwater

Talk to FRANK says:
OK, OK, I heard you.

Dave says:
yeah but is it?

Talk to FRANK says:
True dat.

Dave says:
see this is why people shouldnt do drugs, because when they need help they talk to assholes like you

Talk to FRANK says:
That’s interesting that you should say that, but I don’t think I can answer.

Dave says:
FUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU

Read full topic
